name: Aptech
overview:
Aptech Limited is a Global Learning Solutions company that offers IT,multimedia & animation,hardware & networking, aviation, hospitality,travel & tourism and English language education to individuals (retail business) as well as customized content development services, testing & assessment solutions & corporate training programmes for corporates,universities, government and other institutions. End-to-end learning solutions are delivered by 10 brands including Aptech Computer Education, Arena Animation & Multimedia, Avalon Academy & N-Power Hardware & Networking at hundreds of training centers and via several sales offices across 36 countries.

The company has so far trained 5 million students and provided services to 1000s of institutions. It pioneered the concept of education franchising. It has won awards for being the largest education provider in China & Vietnam. Aptech is a publicly traded company, listed in India on the Bombay Stock Exchange and National Stock Exchange.
